agents.description: Per-agent overrides (claude, gemini, codex). Use this to customize executable paths, args, env, timeouts, or to enable shell mode.

executable.description: Executable name or full path. On Windows, you can point to a .exe/.cmd/.bat shim if PATH resolution fails.

default_model.description: Default model name used when none is provided on the command line.

additional_args.description: Arguments always appended to the command.

shell_executable.description: Optional shell executable (e.g., /bin/zsh, cmd, wsl.exe). When set with shell_command_prefix, the command runs through this shell.

shell_args.description: Arguments passed to the shell executable (e.g., -i -c, /c, -e bash -lc).

shell_command_prefix.description: Prefix command used in shell mode. The prompt and args are appended after this string.

env.description: Environment variables for the agent process.
